org.zanata.rest.service

Interface LocalesResource


  • @Path(value="/locales")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public interface LocalesResource
    Author:
    Alex Eng aeng@redhat.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SERVICE_PATH 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response createLanguage(LocaleDetails localeDetails)
      Create a new language in Zanata
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response delete(String localeId)
      Delete a locale in Zanata
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response get(String filter, String fields, int page, int sizePerPage)
      Retrieves a full list of locales enabled in Zanata.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDetails(String localeId)
      Retrieve locale details
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getMembers(String localeId)
      Retrieve locale member list
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getNewLocales(String filter, int size)
      Retrieves a list of locales that is not added yet in the server.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSourceLocales()
      Returns list of active source locales of all documents for all active projects.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getUITranslations()
      Retrieves a full list of localized locales for server.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response get(@QueryParam(value="filter")
                                                                        String filter,
                                                                        @QueryParam(value="sort")
                                                                        String fields,
                                                                        @DefaultValue(value="1") @QueryParam(value="page")
                                                                        int page,
                                                                        @DefaultValue(value="10") @QueryParam(value="sizePerPage")
                                                                        int sizePerPage)
        Retrieves a full list of locales enabled in Zanata.
        Returns:
        The following response status codes will be returned from this operation:
        OK(200) - Response containing a full list of locales.

 @Path(value="/locale/{localeId}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")

                                                                                                                  String localeId)
        Retrieve locale details

      • getUITranslations

        @GET
 @Path(value="/ui")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getUITranslations()
        Retrieves a full list of localized locales for server.
        Returns:
        The following response status codes will be returned from this operation:
        OK(200) - Response containing a full list of locales.

      • getSourceLocales

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/source")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSourceLocales()
        Returns list of active source locales of all documents for all active projects. Restricted to admin
        Returns:
        OK 200 containing the list of SourceLocaleDetails

      • getNewLocales

        @GET
 @Path(value="/new")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getNewLocales(@QueryParam(value="filter")
                                                                                                       String filter,
                                                                                                       @QueryParam(value="size") @DefaultValue(value="10")
                                                                                                       int size)
        Retrieves a list of locales that is not added yet in the server.
        Returns:
        The following response status codes will be returned from this operation:
        OK(200) - Response containing a list of locales.

      • delete

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/locale/{localeId}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response delete(@PathParam(value="localeId")
                                                                                                                 String localeId)
        Delete a locale in Zanata
        Returns:
        The following response status codes will be returned from this operation:
        OK(200) - Locale is deleted.

      • createLanguage

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/locale")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response createLanguage(LocaleDetails localeDetails)
        Create a new language in Zanata
        Returns:
        The following response status codes will be returned from this operation:
        OK(201) - Locale is added.
        OK(200) - Locale is already exist.
